body_html:
Had the same error the default is not compiling with Cuda 2.0. I had to compile it by my own:

CC=/usr/bin/gcc-4.9 TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST="2.0 3.0 3.5 5.2 6.0 6.1+PTX" env3/bin/python setup.py bdist_wheel
body_text:
Had the same error the default is not compiling with Cuda 2.0. I had to compile it by my own:
CC=/usr/bin/gcc-4.9 TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST="2.0 3.0 3.5 5.2 6.0 6.1+PTX" env3/bin/python setup.py bdist_wheel
body:
Had the same error the default is not compiling with `Cuda 2.0`. I had to compile it by my own:

```
CC=/usr/bin/gcc-4.9 TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST="2.0 3.0 3.5 5.2 6.0 6.1+PTX" env3/bin/python setup.py bdist_wheel
```
